snippet: COOPER--Peter Alan, 84, of Southold, NY, died peacefully at home after a short illness on January 18, 2016. He was a dedicated Cornell University alumnus and active in Phi Gamma Delta. After his retirement as Senior Executive Vice President from Sperry & Hutchison, he purchased and ran Sound Spars in Port Washington, NY. He retired to Southold and wintered in St. Thomas, USVI. He was predeceased by his wife of 56 years, Jean Thompson Cooper, and survived by his daughters Beth Kubinec (John) of Lancaster, PA and Susan Hodge of Warwick, RI, as well as sister Diane Nelson of Delaware, OH, numerous grandchildren and great- grandchildren. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to the Eastern Long Island Hospital Foundation. www.de friestgrattan.com. 1/3
